skill.name: behaviors.skills.CreateThenFilter
skill.description: For an agent to move toward an planned object, create it and then, activate the filtration capability on it. This skill is specific to 'plannedWork' and 'Object' classes. It uses the 'Create' skill with the 'plannedWork'. Because the 'Create' skill returns the created object (ontology.classes.Object) that realizes the concept of 'CheckPoint', this skill uses the 'Filter' skill on this new created object.

parameter.name: plannedWork
parameter.description: The plannified work to create and use to filter.

parameter.name: intensity
parameter.description: The strenght that is used to filter crowds. The value is defined between 0 and 100. A value of '0' means "no filtration at all". A value of '100' means "totally blocked" (the crowds that interact with the checkpoint cannot go through it).

parameter.name: removeWork
parameter.description: Define if planned work that is beeing used to filter crowds need to be destroyed at the end of the skill.

link.name: create
link.description: To enact the decision to create the planned object.

link.name: filter
link.description: To enact the decision to activate the filtration of the created object.

feedback.name: filtering
feedback.description: Sent once the action of filtering is running.

argument.name: object
argument.description: The object created, and used to filter.
